member.name: T:RGN.Modules.Analytics.AnalyticsModule
member.summary: This module is responsible for tracking analytic events

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.Analytics.AnalyticsModule.LogEventAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously logs an analytic event with provided event name into RGN analytics backend This method will retry logging the event up to 7 times
member.param: Optional event parameters to store with the event
Optional parameter to enable cancellation of the task. Default value is an unset CancellationToken.
member.exception: Thrown when eventName is null or empty.
Thrown when the operation is cancelled via the cancellationToken.
